summary: Squirrels are small to medium-sized rodents belonging to the Sciuridae family. They have many types, like tree squirrels and ground squirrels (including chipmunks). Flying squirrels are also part of this family. Originally from the Americas, Eurasia, and Africa, they were brought to Australia by humans. Fossil records show squirrels existed in the Eocene epoch. They are closely related to mountain beavers and dormice.
title: Squirrel
